stories.title: An update on recent service disruptions
Show HN: My NFC business card with wireless LEDs made of a PCB

stories.text: I have my first name as my GH username. Although it is a nice-to-have thing, since my name is common enough I get junk mentions to all sorts of repos, spam PR & constant password resets (attempt to break in?). It has locked me out of my account in the past as well. Is anything doable? Can anyone at GH chime in?
stories.title: Ask HN: Disable GitHub Mention/Resets

stories.text:
I'm approaching my 30s, and I thought I could draw on the wisdom and experience of the HN community, particularly those of you who are 40+ years old.

Thanks.
